data.title: Flip or Flop's Christina Anstead announces split from husband Ant Anstead
data.meta_description: Christina Anstead has announced her split with husband Ant Anstead. The Flip or Flop star revealed the news...
data.text:
Christina Anstead has announced her split with husband Ant Anstead.

The TV personality revealed the news to her 1.4 million followers in a post on Instagram, where she added the pair remain "grateful for each other."

"Ant and I have made the difficult decision to separate. We are grateful for each other and as always, our children will remain our priority. We appreciate your support and ask for privacy for us and our family as we navigate the future," she captioned the post.

Their split comes after less than two years of marriage. The couple tied the knot in December 2018, in a surprise wedding at their home in Newport Beach, California.

They also have a son together, Hudson, who they welcomed in September 2019.

RELATED: Flip or Flop's Tarek El Moussa turns hoarder house into a young family's dream home

Both Christina and Ant work in television, with Ant hosting the car series Wheeler Dealers.

Christina, 37, is the host of Flip or Flop alongside her ex-husband Tarek El Moussa, who she was previously married to for seven years and has two children with. Despite their split the pair have remained amicable and continue to host Flip or Flop together.

Ant is yet to post news of the split to his Instagram, with his last post being of himself and the couples' son playing at the beach.

Stream complete seasons of Flip or Flop for free on 9Now.
